content.title: Grant For Purchase Of Tools (HBOCWWB)
content.department: Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana
content.details: The scheme 'Grant for Purchase of Tools (HBOCWWB)' was launched by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana. Under the scheme, a grant of ₹8000/- is given to the registered construction workers to buy new and suitable tool kits once in 3 years.
benefits: A grant of ₹8000/- is given to the registered construction workers to buy new and suitable tool kits.
The grant facility is available once in three years.
eligibility: The worker should be registered under Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB).
The registered worker should have minimum one-year regular membership.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter Card
An undertaking along with the price, of tools and source of purchase

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Under the scheme, a grant of ₹8000/- is given to the registered construction workers to buy new and suitable tool kits once in 3 years.

faqs.question: Which department has launched this scheme?
faqs.answer: Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to get the benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The registered worker who has one-year regular membership is eligible to apply under the scheme.

faqs.question: Can a general category worker be eligible to apply under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is for all categories of workers.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for a resident of Haryana State?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should be a permanent resident/domicile of Haryana State.

faqs.question: Is it mandatory for workers to have a regular membership of the board?
faqs.answer: Yes, the registered worker must have minimum one-year regular membership.

faqs.question: What is the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: A grant of ₹8000/- is given to the registered construction workers to buy new and suitable tool kits.

faqs.question: When will a worker be eligible to apply again under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The grant facility is available once in three years.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker get registered under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: For registration, the construction worker should visit the Official Website of the Labour Department Haryana.

faqs.question: Is there any registration fee needed while registering under HBOCWWB?
faqs.answer: Yes, the first-time registration charges are ₹25/- and the registration fees vary according to the renewal time period.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The eligible construction worker may apply online mode.

faqs.question: How can a construction worker apply online under the scheme?
faqs.answer: For online application, the construction worker should visit the Official Portal - Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
